content: You can archive the unnecessary rooms or contact the {{productName}} administrator to upgrade the tariff plan.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message indicating that unnecessary rooms can be archived or that the administrator needs to contact them for tariff plan upgrades. It appears in the QuotasBar component and provides context for the user when they are not authorized administrators.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'tariff plan' is translated as 'خطة التعريف' which literally translates to 'definition plan'. It's not the most accurate translation for 'tariff plan' in this context. A better translation would be something like 'باقة الخدمات' (service package) or 'خطة التسعير' (pricing plan).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'tariff plan' as 'باقة الخدمات' or 'خطة التسعير'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "upgrade the tariff plan" is translated as "Tarif planını təkmilləşdirmək". While 'təkmilləşdirmək' can mean 'improve' or 'develop', in this context, 'upgrade' implies a transition to a higher tier or level. A more accurate translation might be something along the lines of 'tarif planını yüksəldə' (to elevate/raise the tariff plan).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'tarif planını yüksəldə' for a more accurate translation of 'upgrade'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "aby tarifní plán aktualizoval" is an awkward and grammatically incorrect translation of "to upgrade the tariff plan". It implies the administrator is *updating* the plan rather than upgrading it.  The verb 'upgradovat' is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nepotřebné místnosti můžete archivovat nebo se obrátit na administrátora {{productName}}, aby tarifní plán upgradoval.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'tariff plan' is translated as 'tilauksen'. While 'tilauksen' can sometimes mean 'plan', in this context referring to an upgrade, a more accurate translation might be 'tilauspaketin' (subscription package) or 'palvelun'.

The phrase "selecta un alt plan tarifar" (select another tariff plan) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'upgrade the tariff plan'. The English implies an improvement or higher tier, whereas the Romanian suggests simply choosing a different plan, which may or may not be an upgrade.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puteți arhiva sălile inutile sau contactați administratorul {{productName}} pentru a face o actualizare a planului tarifar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sau' (or) should ideally be followed by a comma to improve readability in Romanian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puteți arhiva sălile inutile, sau contactați administratorul {{productName}} pentru a face o actualizare a planului tarifar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ඔබට අනවශ්‍ය කාමර සංරක්ෂණය කළ හැකිය" is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be something like "ඔබට අවශ්‍ය නොවූ කාමරarchivක කළ හැකිය" or "ඔබට දැන් අවශ්‍ය නැති කාමරarchivක කළ හැකිය".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට දැන් අවශ්‍ය නැති කාමරarchivක කළ හැකිය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "උත්ශ්‍රේණි කිරීමට" is a less common and slightly awkward way to say 'upgrade'. A more common and natural translation would be "දියුණු කිරීමට".

The phrase "aby vám zvýšil tarifný plán" is an awkward and inaccurate translation of "to upgrade the tariff plan".  It implies the administrator is increasing the plan *for* the user, rather than the administrator performing the upgrade action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The translation should convey the action of the administrator upgrading the plan, not simply increasing it for the user.  A better translation might be something like "...aby vám aktualizoval/zvýšil tarifný plán" or "...aby vám upravil tarifný plán."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "contact the {{productName}} administrator" is translated as "obrnete na skrbnika {{productName}}". While technically correct, "obrnete na administratorja {{productName}}" would be more natural and commonly used in Slovenian.  'Administrator' is often used directly.
The word 'просторије' (prostoriije) is a somewhat formal and less common word for 'rooms'. A more natural and common word would be 'собе' (sobe).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете архивирати непотребне собе или контактирати {{productName}} администратора да бисте надоградили тарифни план.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward.  Using 'ili kontaktirati' can be improved for a more natural flow in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete arhivirati nepotrebne prostorije ili se obratiti {{productName}} administratoru da biste nadogradili tarifni plan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'administratora' is grammatically correct, 'administratoru' would be more appropriate for the dative case indicating 'to the administrator'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete arhivirati nepotrebne prostorije ili kontaktirati {{productName}} administratoru da biste nadogradili tarifni plan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'contact the {{productName}} administrator' is not perfectly translated. 'İletişime geçebilirsiniz' (you can contact) is correct, but 'yöneticisiyle' (with the administrator) could be slightly improved for a more natural Turkish flow. A more fluent phrasing would suggest contacting the administrator directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tarife planını yükseltmek için {{productName}} yöneticisinden destek alabilirsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'upgrade the tariff plan' could be more accurately translated to reflect the nuance of modifying or adjusting the plan.  'Підвищити' (pidvyshchyty) implies an increase, which might not be the intended meaning. A better option might focus on modification or adjustment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ви можете архівувати непотрібні кімнати або звернутися до адміністратора {{productName}}, щоб змінити тарифний план.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Sao lưu” (backup) is not the intended meaning of 'archive' in this context. 'Archive' implies storing something for later retrieval, not creating a copy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có thể lưu trữ các phòng không cần thiết...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of ellipses (...) feels slightly awkward in this context. It is not required and interrupts the flow of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có thể lưu trữ các phòng không cần thiết hoặc liên hệ với quản trị viên {{productName}} để nâng cấp gói dịch vụ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “费用版本” is an awkward and inaccurate translation of "tariff plan". It doesn't convey the meaning of a tiered pricing structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您可以存档不需要的房间或联系{{productName}}管理员升级套餐。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, “存档” is a more formal term and might be replaced with a more conversational alternative depending on the tone of the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您可以归档不需要的房间或联系{{productName}}管理员升级套餐。
